channel.title: Pages on Syniti Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Syniti Documentation

item.title: Group (Errors)
item.description: Group (Errors) Use this page to [View Dashboard Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Dashboard_Metrics.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Dashboard > Group (Errors) in *Navigation* pane. Field Description GROUP ID Displays name of report group. GROUP DESCRIPTION Displays description of report group. GROUP OWNER Displays individual whose task is to manage reports registered to the group and to define the report-level parameters.

item.title: Group Day (Metrics)
item.description: Group Day (Metrics) Use this page to [View Dashboard Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Dashboard_Metrics.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Dashboard > Group Day (Metrics) in *Navigation* pane. Field Description GROUP ID Displays name of group to which the report belongs. DAY 1 Displays number of records in report on Day 1 of reporting period. DAY 2 Displays number of records in report on Day 2 of reporting period.

item.title: Group Metric Graph
item.description: Group Metric Graph Use this page to [Customize Group Metric Graph](../Use_Cases/Populate_Configuration_Tables.htm#Customize_Group_Metric_Graph). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Dashboard > Group Metric Graph in *Navigation* pane. Field Description GRAPH DIRECTORY PATH Provides ability to download and upload file that contains group metric information.

item.title: Group Month (Metrics)
item.description: Group Month (Metrics) Use this page to [View Dashboard Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Dashboard_Metrics.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Dashboard > Group Month (Metrics) in *Navigation* pane. Field Description GROUP ID Displays name of group to which the report belongs. MONTH 1 Displays number of records in report on Month 1 of reporting period. MONTH 2 Displays number of records in report on Month 2 of reporting period.

item.title: Group Reports H
item.description: Group Reports H Group Reports V Use this page to [Register Reports to Groups](../Use_Cases/Register_Reports_to_Groups.htm). To access this page: Click dspMonitor > Reports > Groups in the Navigation pane. Click the Group Reports icon. Field Description REPOSITORY Displays name of database where reports reside. REPORT Displays name of report as it appears in the report repository.

item.title: Group Users
item.description: Group Users Use this page to: - [Add Users to a Report](../Use_Cases/Add_Users_to_a_Report.htm) - [Register Users to Groups](../Use_Cases/Register_Users_to_Groups.htm) To access this page: Click dspMonitor > Your Groupsin Navigation pane. Click Vertical View for Group ID. Click User. Field Description GROUP ID Displays name of report group. USER ID Displays name of individual who has access to view the reports within the group.

item.title: Group Week (Metrics)
item.description: Group Week (Metrics) Use this page to [View Dashboard Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Dashboard_Metrics.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Dashboard > Group Week (Metrics) in *Navigation* pane. Field Description GROUP ID Displays name of group to which the report belongs. WEEK 1 Displays number of records in report on Week 1 of reporting period. WEEK 2 Displays number of records in report on Week 2 of reporting period.

item.title: Groups H
item.description: Groups H Groups V (All Tabs) Use this page to: - [Assign a Group Owner to a Report](../Use_Cases/Assign_Group_Owner_to_a_Report.htm) - [Create Groups](../Use_Cases/Create_Groups_dspMonitor.htm) - [Configure Workflow Schedules for Groups](../Use_Cases/Manage_Workflow_Emails.htm#Configure_Workflow_Schedules_for_Groups) - [Schedule Reports to Process](../Use_Cases/Process_Reports.htm#Schedule_Reports_to_Process) To access this page, select dspMonitor > Configuration > Groups in *Navigation* pane. Field Description GROUP ID Displays name of report group. GROUP DESCRIPTION Displays description of report group.

item.title: Metric Data Column (Config)
item.description: Metric Data Column (Config) Use this page to [Track Error Records on Reports](../Use_Cases/Track_Error_Records_on_Reports.htm). To access this page: Select dspMonitor > Configuration > Report Repositories in *Navigation* pane. Click Reports icon for Repository. Click Vertical View for Report. Click Metric Data Information tab. Click Report Metric Data Build check box to enable metric reporting. Click Yes. Click Report Columns icon to indicate which columns will be tracked for Metric Data Tracking.

item.title: Monitor H
item.description: Monitor H Monitor V Use this page to [Monitor Activity](../Use_Cases/Monitor_Activity.htm). To access this page, click dspMonitor > Monitor in the *Navigation* pane. Field Description JOB ID Displays Platform job that runs the queued report. TITLE Displays user-friendly name of the report. STATUS Displays current status of the processing report. START TIME Displays time when report started processing.

item.title: Object Publish
item.description: Object Publish Use this page to [Create Objects and Publish Reports to Groups](../Use_Cases/Create_Objects_and_Publish_Reports_to_Groups.htm). To access this page: Select dspMonitor > Configuration > Objects in *Navigation* pane. Click Publish to register all reports for the object to a group. Field Description Object name Displays name of object classification in which the report belongs. Group ID Displays name of object group.

item.title: Object Reports
item.description: Object Reports Use this page to: - [Register Reports to Objects](../Use_Cases/Register_Object_Reports.htm#Register_Reports_to_Objects) - [Register Objects to Reports](../Use_Cases/Register_Object_Reports.htm#Register_Objects_to_Reports) To access this page: Select dspMonitor > Configuration > Objects in *Navigation* pane. Click Reports. Field Description OBJECT NAME Displays name of object classification in which the report belongs. REPOSITORY Displays name of database where reports reside. REPORT Displays name of report as it appears in the report repository.

item.title: Objects H
item.description: Objects H Objects V Use this page to [Create Objects and Publish Reports to Groups](../Use_Cases/Create_Objects_and_Publish_Reports_to_Groups.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Configuration > Objects in *Navigation* pane. Field Description OBJECT NAME Displays name of object classification in which the report belongs. DESCRIPTION Displays brief description of object. Reports Click to open the Object Reports page to manage reports registered to the object.

item.title: Parameters
item.description: Parameters Use this page to Configure dspMonitor™ Parameters. This page contains the following tabs: - [General tab](#General_Tab2) - [Metric Parameters tab](#Metric_Parameters_Tab) - [Workflow Parameters tab](#Workflow_Parameters_Tab) - [Misc Parameters tab](#Misc_Parameters_Tab) To access this page, select dspMonitor > Configuration > Parameters in *Navigation* pane. General tab Field Description Application Information Application Name Displays name of DSP® component: dspMonitor™. Version Displays current version of DSP component. Date Displays date when DSP component was released.

item.title: Process Queue Task
item.description: Process Queue Task To access this page: Click dspMonitor > Monitor in the Navigation pane. Click the Tasks icon. Field Description TASK ID Displays job that runs the queued task. STATUS Displays current status of processing task. TASK TYPE Displays type of object being run by the task, e.g., stored procedure, workflow or external page.

item.title: Quality Dimension
item.description: Quality Dimension Use this page to [Register Quality Dimensions](../Use_Cases/Populate_Configuration_Tables.htm#Register_Quality_Dimensions). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Administrative > Configuration > Quality Dimension in *Navigation* pane. Field Description QUALITY DIMENSION Displays an additional categorization of the report PRIORITY Displays the priority order used to display the quality dimensions in the list box on the Repository Reports page’s vertical view and on the Data Quality Scoring Dashboard page.

item.title: Report Data (Metrics) H
item.description: Report Data (Metrics) H Report Data (Metrics) V Use this page to [View Dashboard Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Dashboard_Metrics.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Dashboard > Report Data (Metrics) in *Navigation* pane. Field Description COMMENT Displays additional information about report. REPORT TYPE Displays the categorization of report. Values are: Error, Information and Metric. IMPLICATION Displays description of what the report means to the business.

item.title: Report Day (Metrics)
item.description: Report Day (Metrics) Use this page to [View Dashboard Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Dashboard_Metrics.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Dashboard > Report Day (Metrics) in *Navigation* pane. Field Description REPORT DESC Displays user-friendly name of report. DAY 1 Displays number of records in report on Day 1 of reporting period. DAY 2 Displays number of records in report on Day 2 of reporting period.

item.title: Report Metric Details
item.description: Report Metric Details Use this page to [View Dashboard Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Dashboard_Metrics.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Reports > Report Metric Details in *Navigation* pane. Field Description COUNTER Displays unique identifier for the report workflow record. REPORT Displays name of report as it appears in the report repository. Click link to view SQL code used to generate report.

item.title: Report Month (Metrics)
item.description: Report Month (Metrics) Use this page to [View Dashboard Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Dashboard_Metrics.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Dashboard > Report Month (Metrics) in *Navigation* pane. Field Description REPORT DESC Displays user-friendly name of report. MONTH 1 Displays number of records in report on Month 1 of reporting period. MONTH 2 Displays number of records in report on Month 2 of reporting period.

item.title: Report Repositories H
item.description: Report Repositories H Report Repositories V Use this page to Register Report Repositories in dspMonitor™. To access this page, select Configuration > Report Repositories in the *Navigation* pane. Field Description REPOSITORY Displays name of database where reports reside. Reports Click to manage reports within the report repository. Collect Targets Click to open the Repository Collect Target page to register Collect targets to a report repository.

item.title: Report Target Table Columns H
item.description: Report Target Table Columns H Report Target Table Columns V Use this page to [Register Collect Target Table Columns to a Report](../Use_Cases/Register_Collect_Target_Table_Columns_to_a_Report.htm). To access this page: 1. Select dspMonitor > Configuration > Report Repositories in the Navigation pane. 2. Click the Reports icon. 3. Click the Target Tables icon. 4. Click the Columns icon. Field Description TABLE NAME Displays the table name.

item.title: Report Target Tables H
item.description: Report Target Tables H Report Target Tables V Use this page to [Register Collect Target Tables to a Report](../Use_Cases/Register_Collect_Target_Tables_to_a_Report.htm). To access this page: Select dspMonitor > Configuration > Report Repositories in the Navigation pane. Click the Reports icon. Click the Target Tables icon. Field Description COLLECT TARGET Displays the target name. TABLE NAME Displays the table name.

item.title: Report Week (Metrics)
item.description: Report Week (Metrics) Use this page to [View Dashboard Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Dashboard_Metrics.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Dashboard > Report Week (Metrics) in *Navigation* pane. Field Description REPORT DESC Displays user-friendly name of report. WEEK 1 Displays number of records in report on Week 1 of reporting period. WEEK 2 Displays number of records in report on Week 2 of reporting period.

item.title: Report Workflows H
item.description: Report Workflows H Report Workflows V Use this page to view data while [Managing Workflow Emails](../Use_Cases/Manage_Workflow_Emails.htm). To access this page: Click dspMonitor > Configuration > Users Reports/Filters in the Navigation pane. Click the Workflows icon. Field Description COUNTER Displays unique identifier for the report workflow record. GROUP ID Displays name of group to which the report belongs.

item.title: Report in Groups
item.description: Report in Groups To access this page: Select dspMonitor > Configuration > Objects in the Navigation pane. Click the Reports icon for an object. Click the Groups icon for a report. Field Description GROUP ID Displays name of group to which the report belongs. GROUP OWNER Displays individual whose task is to manage reports registered to the group and to define the report-level parameters.

item.title: Reports (Errors)
item.description: Reports (Errors) Use this page to [View Dashboard Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Dashboard_Metrics.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Dashboard > Reports (Errors) in the *Navigation* pane. Field Description COMMENT Displays comment or description about report. IMPLICATION Displays description of what the report means to the business. DATE Displays date when error occurred. REPOSITORY Displays name of database where reports reside.

item.title: Reports (Metrics)
item.description: Reports (Metrics) Use this page to [View Dashboard Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Dashboard_Metrics.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Dashboard > Reports (Metrics) in *Navigation* pane. Field Description GROUP ID Displays name of report group. REPOSITORY Displays name of database where reports reside. REPORT Displays name of report as it appears in the report repository. DATE Displays date when report metric was captured.

item.title: Repository Collect Target
item.description: Repository Collect Target Use this page to [Register Collect Targets to a Report Repository](../Use_Cases/Register_Collect_Targets_to_a_Report_Repository.htm). To access this page: Select dspMonitor > Configuration > Report Repositories in the Navigation pane. Click the Collect Targets icon. Field Description Include Click to include the target from reporting. Remove Click to remove the target from reporting. REPOSITORY Displays the name of the report repository.

item.title: Repository Reports H
item.description: Repository Reports H Repository Reports V Use this page to [Register Reports to a Report Repository](../Use_Cases/Register_Reports_to_a_Report_Repo.htm). To access this page: Select dspMonitor > Configuration > Report Repositories in *Navigation* pane. Click Reports for Repository. Field Description REPORT Displays name of report as it appears in the report repository. Click link to view SQL code used to generate report. OPPORTUNITY VIEW

item.title: Schedule Service Page H
item.description: Schedule Service Page H Schedule Service Page V Use this page to [Configure Schedules on Service Pages](../Config/Configure_Schedules_on_Services_Pages.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Configuration > Schedule Service Page in *Navigation* pane. Field Description SERVICE Displays name of service page that runs a process within dspMonitor™. NEXT START TIME Displays next date and time when service page is scheduled to run.

item.title: Sigma Levels
item.description: Sigma Levels Use this page to [Register Data Quality Score Thresholds](../Use_Cases/Populate_Configuration_Tables.htm#Register_Data_Quality_Score_Thresholds). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Configuration > Sigma Level in Navigation pane. Field Description SIGMA LEVEL Displays the Sigma Level. SIGMA1.5SHIFT Displays the sigma shift value. DPMO Displays the defective parts per million opportunities. PERCENT DEFECTIVE Displays the percentage of defective parts per million opportunities.

item.title: Target Table Column Threshold
item.description: Target Table Column Threshold Use this page to [Register Thresholds for Collect Target Table Columns](../Use_Cases/Register_Thresholds_for_Collect_Target_Table_Columns.htm). To access this page: Select dspMonitor > Configuration > Report Repositories in the Navigation pane. Click the Collect Targets icon. Click the Configure Thresholds icon. Click the Configure Columns icon. Field Description TABLE NAME Displays the table name. COLUMN NAME Displays the column name.

item.title: Target Table Threshold
item.description: Target Table Threshold Use this page to [Register Thresholds for Collect Target Tables](../Use_Cases/Register_Thresholds_for_Collect_Target_Tables.htm). To access this page: Select dspMonitor > Configuration > Report Repositories in the Navigation pane. Click the Collect Targets icon. Click the Configure Thresholds icon. Field Description TABLE NAME Displays the table name. THRESHOLD ID Displays the threshold ID used for data quality scoring.

item.title: User (Errors)
item.description: User (Errors) Use this page to [View Dashboard Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Dashboard_Metrics.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Dashboard > User (Errors) in the *Navigation* pane. Field Description NAME Displays the name of the user assigned to the error reports. DATE Displays date when error occurred. ERRORS Displays the number of errors on the reports. STATUS

item.title: User (Filters)
item.description: User (Filters) Use this page to [Define Filters](../Use_Cases/Configure_User_Settings_Reports_and_Filters.htm#Define_Filters). To access this page: Select dspMonitor > Configuration > User Reports/Filters in *Navigation* pane. Click Filters for User ID. Field Description USER ID Displays User ID for individual registered to dspMonitor™. FIELD Displays field that is filtered. OPERATOR Displays operator used to filter field by the CONSTANT.

item.title: User (Reports) H
item.description: User (Reports) H User (Reports) V Use this page to: - [Customize Report Settings](../Use_Cases/Configure_User_Settings_Reports_and_Filters.htm#Customize_Report_Settings) - [Define Where Clauses](../Use_Cases/Configure_User_Settings_Reports_and_Filters.htm#Define_Where_Clauses) - [Configure Workflow Schedules for User Reports](../Use_Cases/Manage_Workflow_Emails.htm#Configure_Workflow_Schedules_for_User_Reports) - [Change Frequency of User Workflows](../Use_Cases/Tips_and_Troubleshooting.htm#Change_Frequency_of_User_Workflows) To access this page: Select dspMonitor > Configuration > User Reports/Filters in *Navigation* pane. Click Reports for User ID. Field Description GROUP ID Displays name of report group.

item.title: User Filters (Metrics)
item.description: User Filters (Metrics) Use this page to [View Dashboard Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Dashboard_Metrics.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Dashboard > User Filters (Metrics) in *Navigation* pane. Field Description NAME Displays name of user. REPORT Displays name of report as it appears in the report repository. FILTER Displays filter applied to report.

item.title: Users Reports/Filters
item.description: Users Reports/Filters Use this page to [Customize User Settings](../Use_Cases/Configure_User_Settings_Reports_and_Filters.htm#Customize_User_Settings). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Configuration > User Reports/Filters in *Navigation* pane. Field Description USER ID Displays User ID for individual registered to dspMonitor™. NAME Displays name that corresponds to the User ID. E MAIL ADDRESS Displays email address of User ID. This is the email address registered in the user’s DSP® login profile.

item.title: Your Application Table Column Reports H
item.description: Your Application Table Column Reports H NOTE: When a user accesses this page in the Navigation pane, the fields below display. When a user clicks the View icon on this page to view report data, the report title still displays as the page name even though columns that display depend on the columns on the generated report. In this case, the page displays the report’s columns only and not the fields below.

item.title: Your Application Table Columns
item.description: Your Application Table Columns Use this page to [View Your Application Table Columns](../Use_Cases/View_Your_Application_Table_Columns.htm). To access this page: Select dspMonitor > Your Applications in the Navigation pane. Click the Tables icon. Click the Columns icon. Field Description TABLE NAME Display the name of the table. COLUMN NAME Displays the name of the column. SIGMA LEVEL Displays the sigma level based on data quality score calculations.

item.title: Your Application Table Reports H
item.description: Your Application Table Reports H NOTE: When a user accesses this page in the Navigation pane, the fields below display. When a user clicks the View icon on this page to view report data, the report title still displays as the page name even though columns that display depend on the columns on the generated report. In this case, the page displays the report’s columns only and not the fields below.

item.title: Your Application Tables H
item.description: Your Application Tables H Your Application Tables V Use this page to: - [View Your Application Tables](../Use_Cases/View_Your_Application_Tables.htm) - [Profile a Target Table in dspMonitor](../Use_Cases/Profile_a_Target_Table_in_dspMonitor.htm) To access this page: Select dspMonitor > Your Applications in *Navigation* pane. Click the Tables icon. Field Description APPLICATION Displays the name of the application. TABLE NAME Displays the name of the table.

item.title: Your Applications
item.description: Your Applications Use this page to [View Your Applications](../Use_Cases/View_Your_Applications.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Your Applications in the Navigation pane. Field Description APPLICATION Displays the name of the application. SIGMA LEVEL Displays the sigma level based on data quality score calculations. The Enable Sigma Level checkbox on the Parameters page must be checked for this field to display.

item.title: Your Dashboard Reports
item.description: Your Dashboard Reports To access this page: Select dspMonitor > Dashboard > User (Errors) in *Navigation* pane. Click the Reports icon. Field Description REPORT Displays name of report as it appears in the report repository. DATE TIME Displays date and time when the report was last processed. RECORD COUNT Displays number of records in report when the report was last processed.

item.title: Your Favorite Reports H
item.description: Your Favorite Reports H NOTE: When a user accesses this page in the Navigation pane, the fields below display. When a user clicks the View icon on this page to view report data, the report title still displays as the page name even though columns that display depend on the columns on the generated report. In this case, the page displays the report’s columns only and not the fields below.

item.title: Your Filters
item.description: Your Filters Use this page to [View Your Filters](../Use_Cases/View_Your_Filters.htm). To access this page select dspMonitor > Your Filters in *Navigation* pane. Field Description FIELD Displays field that is filtered. OPERATOR Displays operator used to filter field by the CONSTANT. CONSTANT Displays value compared to field using the OPERATOR.

item.title: Your Group Reports H
item.description: Your Group Reports H NOTE: When a user accesses this page in the Navigation pane, the fields below display. When a user clicks the View icon on this page to view report data, the report title still displays as the page name even though columns that display depend on the columns on the generated report. In this case, the page displays the report’s columns only and not the fields below.

item.title: Your Groups H
item.description: Your Groups H Your Groups V Use this page to: - [Manually Process Group Reports](../Use_Cases/Process_Reports.htm#Manually_Process_Group_Reports) - [View Your Groups](../Use_Cases/View_Your_Groups.htm) To access this page, select dspMonitor > Your Groups in *Navigation* pane. Field Description Process Click to process your reports within the group. Process For All Users Click to process all the reports within the group for all users who have access to the reports.

item.title: Your Metrics
item.description: Your Metrics Use this page to view report metrics for Your Group Reports, Your Favorite Reports, Your Application Table Reports, and Your Application Table Column Reports. To access this page: Select dspMonitor > Your Groups in Navigation pane. Click the Favorites or Reports icon. Click the Metrics icon. Or Select dspMonitor > Your Applications in Navigation pane. Click Tables icon. Click Reports icon. Click the Metrics icon.

item.title: Your Object Reports H
item.description: Your Object Reports H NOTE: When a user accesses this page in the Navigation pane, the fields below display. When a user clicks the View icon on this page to view report data, the report title still displays as the page name even though columns that display depend on the columns on the generated report. In this case, the page displays the report’s columns only and not the fields below.

item.title: Your Objects H
item.description: Your Objects H Your Objects V Use this page to [View Your Objects](../Use_Cases/View_Your_Objects.htm). To access this page, select dspMonitor > Your Objects in the Navigation pane. Field Description OBJECT NAME Displays the object name. DESCRIPTION Displays a description on the object. SIGMA LEVEL Displays the sigma level based on data quality score calculations. The Enable Sigma Level checkbox on the Parameters page must be checked for this field to display.
